entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as needing a new wand.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: A person who is dead and whose wand Voldemort wants to borrow.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of the main characters, who hands over her wand to Voldemort.

relationships.description: Voldemort wants to borrow Gregorovitch's wand because he is dead and can't find a new one.
Hermione hands over her wand to Voldemort, who wants to borrow it.
